comments_since_last_sample.body: I really love those citrus, water notes in Acqua di Gio. It'd be great to get some of this fresh beast!
I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.

I would love to be entered for the ADG drawing. Aqua Di Gio was my signature scent for a long time, but I no longer have a bottle. I am, however, rocking Perry Ellis 360 Red as my SOTD today. It is cold outside and smells amazing!

I've never smelled or owned ADG but grew up around Cool Water wearers and am on the thrifty end not wanting to spend more than $50 usually for colognes and preferring 100ml+ on a price per oz/ml tip. That led me to clone houses until I settled on Mont Blanc and John Varvatos as a base of my collection with Prada/D&G/Versace as the "upper"end of designer that I'm comfortable going for dates and dumb reaches when I use discounters. I'd love to finally own ADG but if not still love watching your content!
